verbose_text: We have previously characterised mesenchymal stromal cells (MSCs) isolated from whole human umbilical cord (UC) and shown them to have a greater proliferative capacity and equivalent immunomodulatory ability (in terms of gene expression of indoleamine 2,3-dioxygenase (IDO) and human leukocyte antigen (HLA)-G than MSCs derived from adult human bone marrow [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
